mapper.select: select * from ( select a.*, rownum rn from ( select q.*, c.cname from qna q, customer c where qdel = 'n' and q.cid = c.cid order by qdate desc) a ) where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
select count(*) from qna where qdel = 'n'
select q.*, c.cname from qna q, customer c where qid = #{qid} and q.cid = c.cid
mapper.insert: insert into qna values (#{qid}, '질문입니다.', #{qcontent}, null, sysdate, #{cid}, 'n')
mapper.update: update qna set qcontent = #{qcontent} where qid = #{qid}
